The claim was posted on Facebook on June: 2020, and has been shared more than 6,000 times.
The Tagalog: language caption of the post mentions the conjoined twins being born in Surigao, southern Philippines at 4 am and urges people to share the post to help them.
Surigao is located in Mindanao: a major island in the southern Philippines.
A reverse image search on Google reveale: These reports include a Spanish-language report by noticiasya.com, a report by US television network Fox News, and a report by UK tabloid newspaper The Mirror.
